name: A Druid's Tale
description:
Embody a druid wandering through the lands as you spiritually connect with animals to control them and have them aid you in your journey. 

How to Play: WASD to move. Left click on an animal to connect. Right click on a connected animal to possess. Right click on the player to return all possessions to normal connections. Esc to reset the level. Get to the finish line to win.
